question: Which of these statements about food are your favourite?

answers.b: Pride is all very well, but a sausage is a sausage.
answers.c: A BLT, heavy on the B
answers.d: Food? I'd rather drink! Anything vaguely alcoholic (turpentine / rat poison / lamp oil etc.)

question: Which of these activities is your idea of a good time?

answers.a: Singing songs like 'The Hedgehog Can Never Be Buggered At All'
answers.b: Playing a board game with a friend
answers.d: Going to the pub and eating peanuts

question: Which of these is your specialist subject?

answers.a: Attacking anyone who calls me a monkey
answers.d: Chasing criminals and setting traps for assassins

question: Which of these is your favourite animal?
Which is your favourite mode of transport?
Which is your favourite reading material?

answers.d: Written music rather than listening to it performed

question: Which would you prefer as a Hogswatch present?

answers.d: A warm place by the fire and NO BATHS

question: Would you ever eat a fried rat?

answers.a: Only if I was really hungry

question: Who is the strangest person you've met?

answers.c: Don't do anything I wouldn't do, if you ever find anything I wouldn't do.
